== Developer Membership Board meeting, 2013-01-28 ==

Chair: Stefano Rivera

Members Present: Stefano Rivera, Stéphane Graber, Micah Gersten, Benjamin Drung, Barry Warsaw

=== Review of previous action items ===

* We voted to accept the Dynamic PPU procedure
   
** http://people.ubuntu.com/~laney/dynamic-ppu-procedure.txt
** For: 5, Against: 0, Abstentions: 0
** Action: Iain to publish the Dynamic PPU Procedure on the wiki somewhere

* Upcoming re-staffing election
   Action: Micah to run the election, starting ASAP, ending on midnight 10th-11th Feb

=== Aron Xu's application for upload rights to im-config and other pkg-ime packages ===

* Link: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AronXu/DeveloperApplication
* The application was re-defined from a set of PPU rights, to an input-methods package set, containing "packages maintained by the pkg-ime team in Debian, and im-config"

* The outcome of the application was voted on:

** For: 5, Against: 0, Abstained: 0

** It passed, unanimously, and Aron Xu was added to the ubuntu-input-methods-uploaders Launchpad Team, which was granted upload rights to the packageset described above.

* Congratulations, Aron.
